title: Is It Wrong to Move Away From My Ailing Grandfather?
description:
Becky is having a hard time juggling the responsibilities of caring for her grandfather and parenting two young children while her commercial fisherman husband is gone for months at a time. - Dr. Laura: "Your first obligation is to your children."

What's happening in your life that's stressful and hard to balance? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
